title: Activity log and OTEL log files write to hardcoded ~/.h2/logs instead of resolved H2_DIR
description: session.go:setupAgent() constructs logDir as filepath.Join(os.Getenv("HOME"), ".h2", "logs"). When a custom H2_DIR is in use (env var, or marker file walk-up), logs still go to ~/.h2/logs instead of <h2-dir>/logs. Fix: use config.ConfigDir() instead of os.Getenv("HOME") + ".h2".
